channel.title: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!
channel.description:
Okay.. instead of .cgf or .txt, the source I have is using .bin files!
WHY?!?!! and how do I open and view/edit them? :mad:

item.title: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!
item.dc:creator: @kthillman kthillman
item.description:
@kthillman wrote:

Nope. I did this through handler… was alot easier.

But I wanna get into shops and make them buy anything and everything, because the ShopEditor makes the Shops file into Shops.bin

Read full topic
item.source: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!

item.title: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“kthillman, post:4, topic:443795”]Umm… no. :mad:
Im using dementhium 637.

All the char files and everything are saved in .bin form.[/quote]
I know what he’s talking about,
If you’re trying to make yourself owner.
go to the commands
and make it so only you can give ranks
assuming you know how.
then obviously.
::giverank 2 username.

item.source: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!

item.title: How the HELL do you open .bin files?!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

LOL, now that I’m done laughing, I shall help you. Even though I highly suggest not programming anymore. But thats not my decision so I will help you. You edit .java files not .class. And there is no such thing as .bin files thats just the File Class files are stored in. ONLY EDIT .JAVA AND OPEN IT WITH ECLIPSE/NOTEPAD

Read full topic
